articles.description: Follow live text, in-play video clips and radio commentary as England play New Zealand in the opening game of the Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
articles.title: World Cup: England bat first after NZ win toss - clips, radio & text

articles.description: Champions League reaction after Newcastle thrash PSG 4-1 at St James' Park, Man City beat Leipzig and Celtic lose at Lazio.
articles.title: Newcastle thrash PSG, Man City win, Celtic beaten - reaction

articles.description: Brighton's Ansu Fati has gone from being a prodigy at Barcelona to almost a forgotten man - Guillem Balague takes a closer look at his journey.
articles.title: From Messi's heir to forgotten man - Ansu Fati a victim of own success

articles.description: England's Harry Brook hits Rachin Ravindra for three boundaries in a row but is caught in the deep going for a fourth to end his innings on 25 off 16.
articles.title: Four, four, six & out - Brook falls on 25

articles.description: Newcastle United and the Toon Army waited two decades for a Champions League night like this and it was worth every day, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: 'Newcastle win worth the 20-year wait for Toon fans'

articles.description: Watch as Joe Root scoops Trent Boult for six during the opening game of the 2023 Cricket World Cup in India.
articles.title: 'Fantastic shot' Root scoops Boult for six

articles.description: Adam Peaty returns to swimming on Friday with a major new rival threatening his dominance of the 100m breaststroke.
articles.title: Returning Peaty 'excited' by emergence of new rival Qin

articles.description: MCC expels one member and suspends two others following altercations with Australia players at Lord's during the second Ashes Test in July.
articles.title: MCC expels member after Long Room confrontation

articles.description: Arsenal head coach Jonas Eidevall signs a new long-term contract with the Women's Super League side.
articles.title: Arsenal coach Eidevall signs new long-term deal

articles.description: Want to know about England's players at the Cricket World Cup in India? Bowler Reece Topley tells all, including a tip for the next James Bond.
articles.title: Meet my World Cup team-mates, by England’s Reece Topley
